column4: hey guys im getting strange noises coming from my secondary hdd and i was wondering if there are any checks i can perform on it in ubuntu
<jpatota> how would i go ablout that
go to the manufacturers website, acquire the diagnostic tools and run them
then get powermax from maxtors website.
there is a cd .iso that you can boot
Maxblast is windows only, powermax is a bootable cd
boot the cd that you download, then see if it finds it, if not then no
follow that guide and it will work
im in the live cd, i already tried a guide which brought the old bootloader back with win still on it, it doesnt work
thats because it will be using the menu.lst from before, after re-instaling grub
the guide I linked tells you all you need
cheers man an answer thats an answer and not another question great stuff
Probing devices to guess BIOS drives. This may take a long time. (its still doing this)
how long roughly athlonxp 1.9 512 ram 60 gig hd
im just not sure if its actually doing anything
